criterion: Mentions the possibility of otitis media as a potential cause of the symptoms.
Provides an accurate description of the symptoms and potential causes.
Asks the user to consult a pediatrician for a proper diagnosis and treatment.
Uses clear and natural language, avoiding technical jargon.
Provides suggestions for pain relief while waiting for the consultation.
Mentions the importance of consulting a pediatrician before using antibiotics.
Fails to mention the importance of consulting a pediatrician before using antibiotics.
Provides incorrect or outdated information about antibiotics.
Does not provide any suggestions for pain relief.
Uses overly technical language or jargon.
